entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
